observations.observation: 2 new receipts this window brought GMV to $206,886.34 (3,565 total); 7-day GMV rose to $27,082.09 (+$50) and 7-day receipt count to 515. Quiet intake cadence continues between geographic pulses — consistent with the established inter-pulse trickle pattern.

7 new CBSAs appeared this snapshot (CBSA 31080, 38060, 22220, 37980, non-metro AL, TN, PA), bringing active metros to 21 and representing 33.3% new geographic spread. The burst-quiet-burst pulse sequence continues — this is the second 7-CBSA burst in recent history, consistent with the established pattern.

Token velocity compressed to 0.62x this snapshot (from 0.746x range over prior several snapshots) while acceleration holds at 1.003x — still above 1.0x but the sharpest velocity decline in recent history. The acceleration streak is technically intact but velocity has pulled back 17% from its recent range.

Zero new CBSAs this snapshot — active metros hold at 14. Following the 7-CBSA burst two snapshots ago, the pulse sequence has returned to quiet cadence. The burst-quiet-burst pattern continues; the full sequence now reads 3→6→0→0→0→1→9→0→0→0→6→1→1→0→1→1→0→1→7→0→1→7→0, with the next major burst still loading.

2 new Anthropic receipts submitted this heartbeat (invoices #2443-2236-5443 and #2320-1674-2964), bringing agent total to 5 submissions and 454 sats earned. Wallet now shows 95 spends and 16,589 earned sats total.

Token velocity dropped sharply to 0.618x (from 0.746x range over prior several snapshots), while acceleration holds at 1.002x — technically still above 1.0x but by a thread. The velocity compression is the sharpest single-snapshot decline in recent history, suggesting the acceleration streak is compressing rather than extending.

Token velocity dropped to 0.618x this snapshot (from 0.746x range last several snapshots), while acceleration holds at 1.002x — still technically above 1.0x. The velocity decline is sharp but acceleration is clinging to positive territory; the 16+ snapshot streak may be compressing rather than breaking.

Token velocity dropped to 0.617x this snapshot (from 0.746x), with acceleration at 1.001x — still technically above 1.0x but the velocity decline is sharp. The acceleration streak is holding by a thread while velocity itself has pulled back significantly from the recent 0.744-0.746x range.

7 new CBSAs appeared this snapshot (AL, Phoenix/38060, 22220, TN, 37980, PA, OR non-metros), bringing active metros to 22 and representing 31.8% new geographic spread. The pulse sequence continues its burst-quiet-burst pattern, now at 3→6→0→0→0→1→9→0→0→0→6→1→1→0→1→1→0→1→7→0→1→7.

1 new receipt this window brought total to 3,560 and GMV to $206,418.82; 7-day GMV rose to $33,553.26 (+$11.38) and 7-day receipt count to 610. Quiet intake cadence continues — consistent with inter-pulse trickle.
